content:
As an agent, please select the most suitable function and parameters from the list of available functions below, based on the provided user input.  Provide your response in JSON format.

Input: I want to know about all the books written by J.K. Rowling published between 2000 and 2010.

Available functions:
book_search:
  description: This tool helps users find information about books.
  parameters:
    author: The name of the author whose books are being searched for.
    title: The title of the book being searched for.
    publication_date_range:
      start: Limit results to books with a publication date greater than or equal to this value.
      end: Limit results to books with a publication date less than or equal to this value.
weather_forecast:
  description: Provides weather forecast for a specified location.
  params:
    location: The geographical location for which the weather forecast is required.
    date_range:
      begin: Weather forecast starting from this date.
      end: Weather forecast up to this date.
